REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0742 reute b f BC-NITTO-BOSEKI-LAUNCHES 04-02 0049

TEXT.TITLE: NITTO BOSEKI LAUNCHES 60 MLN SFR 4-7/8 PCT BOND
TEXT.BODY: Nitto Boseki Co Ltd of Tokyo is launching a 60 mln Swiss franc 4-7/8 pct bond due April 27, 1995 at 100-1/4 pct, lead manager Union Bank of Switzerland said. Subscriptions close April 8 and payment date is April 27. REUTER
